## Open-source pH sensor

::: columns
::: {.column width="49%"}
I am currently developing a low-cost, high-frequency, open-source intertidal pH sensor in collaboration with Dr. David Burnett at Portland State University. I presented our initial results at OCEANS 2023 Limerick for the Student Poster Competition. The Github repository for this project can be found <a href="https://github.com/ameliaritger/arduino-ph-sensor" target="_blank">here</a>. Stay tuned for additional updates and publications!
